articles.title: Edge’s first SmackDown match since 2011 will have Fastlane implications - Cageside Seats
articles.description: The winner gets to be special enforcer for next Sunday’s PPV Universal title match. Either way, it should fuel Edge’s rivalries with both Roman Reigns and Daniel Bryan heading into WrestleMania 37.
